full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGOS NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG DGE SLONG BLO @011B BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,BSAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL PA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG DGE BSGOS BSAM BTAN RGYA MTSO'I, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
